title: Digital-Based Flexible Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Nursing Skills and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for in-service nurses, emphasizing personal device utilization and real-time interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient safety management protocols with over 90% accuracy using digital platforms
Learners can execute emergency response procedures in simulation-based scenarios by categorizing them into three or more phases in flexible learning environments
Learners can conduct peer assessment and feedback using online collaboration tools and develop team-based nursing care plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
